alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 14 at 9:22AM CST until November 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches. * WHERE...Southern Cook County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel is expected to be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
